title: [Large-Scale] Comparative Study on Online-Asynchronous Laboratory Learning Designs for Anatomy and Physiology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational anatomy and physiology knowledge, and comprehension of advanced life science concepts
context.additional_context: An asynchronous digital learning environment for office/administrative professionals, combining project-based assessments with standardized knowledge validation tools

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain the difference in learning effectiveness between online and traditional laboratory settings with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can submit project outcomes applying core concepts of anatomy and physiology with a 90% completion level.
Learners can statistically compare and analyze academic achievement (exam scores, lab evaluations, overall grades) between two experimental methods with significance (p<0.05).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
